text:
Hi HN!

I’m excited to share Convert Text, a lightweight tool I built to simplify the way we work with text. It’s designed to transform text quickly and efficiently—offline and privately.

The idea came from my own frustrations as a developer and occasional writer. I often needed to switch between multiple online tools for tasks like converting text to camelCase, cleaning up formatting, or counting characters. But those tools were slow, filled with ads, or required an internet connection. I wanted something faster, distraction-free, and more privacy-focused.

So I built Convert Text! It runs entirely offline, works instantly, and supports a range of use cases for developers, writers, and anyone who handles text daily.

Key Features:

100% Offline: Keeps your data private—no internet required. Comprehensive Format Support: Title Case, PascalCase, snake_case, CamelCase, and more. Text Analysis: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs at a glance. Web Tools: HTML encoding/decoding, URL formatting, Base64 conversion. Developer-Specific Tools: Clean formats (strip spaces, trim whitespace), and encoding options. Building this tool has been incredibly exciting, and I’d love for the HN community to try it and share feedback. What do you think? Are there any features you’d like to see added?

Thanks for checking it out!
